name: NYDailyNews
text:
Bill Murray’s son was arrested at a Black Lives Matter rally.

The 27-year-old Murray was picked up by cops after he allegedly attacked deputies, spit on and bit a police officer and threatened arson.
https://t.co/p4FxQyt370

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The Oakland A’s owner reversed course, saying he will pay minor leaguers this season.

“These players represent our future and we will immediately begin paying our minor-league players. I take responsibility and I’m making it right," John Fisher said.
https://t.co/cK4h3uMBXU

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A multiracial family was mistaken for Antifa during a camping trip and terrorized by locals in Washington State.

The family was confronted by a group of roughly eight vehicles who were armed with guns and chainsaws outside a camping supplies store.
https://t.co/M3Y8sHUIgi

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The Molotov cocktail-tossing Brooklyn lawyers’ home detention was revoked; an appeals panel sent them back to lock-up, instead.

The two are facing five to 20 years in prison for the attack.
https://t.co/q6O2THUbKl

name: NYDailyNews
text: RT @TomBiersdorfer: Our @NYDNSports back page: It's going to take a lot more than talk for Roger Goodell to make up for NFL's mistakes. @PLeonardNYDN @NFL @nflcommish @Kaepernick7 -- https://t.co/dQmWLhmiae https://t.co/U0SDVl0Tua

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Two men responsible for a hit and run attack of an NYPD sergeant in the Bronx were arrested in South Carolina.

The sergeant and another officer were crossing a street when the two men in a black sedan barreled into the sergeant, sending him flying.
https://t.co/oWyBQiYkfZ

name: NYDailyNews
text:
OPINION: The videos have been seriously disturbing, but NYC's mayor insists he hasn’t seen clips of police roughing up protesters, violently taking bikes and arresting people for breaking curfew.

De Blasio’s had a pretty weak week. @harrysiegel writes
https://t.co/3NCJqeTOhe

name: NYDailyNews
text:
It’s official: Biden is the Democratic presidential nominee.

The former vice president has effectively been his party's leader since his last challenger in the Democratic primary, Bernie Sanders, ended his campaign in April.
https://t.co/3G09lr0uyn
